name: GlucoseLabTest
title: Glucose lab test
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes for lab tests commonly used for a glucose lab test.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype Laboratory Test, Performed.  The intent of this data element is to identify patients who had a glucose lab test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only codes that represent a glucose lab test using the specimen source of blood/serum/plasma. Point of Care (POC) testing sources are included.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes any codes representing a glucose lab test using any other specimen source.)
